reviewText: Restaurant worker Raghavan (Sarath Kumar) is the king of his domain at work but leads a meager existence at home. He can't believe his luck when he meets Geeta, a beautiful, pleasant young girl from an affluent family. Unfazed by Geeta's riches, Raghavan merely wishes to lead a life full of love with his newfound flame. Will their opposite backgrounds get in the way of their dream to be together?
